name: volt-absorb
caption: Volt Absorb

effect.full:
Whenever an []{type:electric}-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum [HP]{mechanic:hp}, negating any other effect on it.

This ability will not take effect if this Pokémon is []{type:ground}-type and thus immune to Electric moves.  Electric moves will ignore this Pokémon's []{move:substitute}.

This effect includes non-damaging moves, i.e. []{move:thunder-wave}.

flavorText:
Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead
of taking damage.
